name: Duck Hunt (NeonNautilus)
description:
Duck Hunt

Created by ChatGPT (and me) All the code was generated by chatGPT with prompts about creating a simple JavaScript hunting game, even the image was generated by ChatGPT providing a detailed instruction of what the game cover would look like based off the original "Duck Hunt" from the 1980's feed into midjourney.

I might spend time and update the game with new graphics, and better gameplay without the use of GPT if I get the time,

Game does not work on mobile devices - only desktop browsers

Mouse click to shoot your gun.
R - To reload.

Miss more then 5 ducks and its game over,
